const areaIDs = [7102, 15959, 17875, 17979, 19128, 20245, 20251, 20252, 20917, 20919, 20930, 20944, 21732, 21753, 21756, 21759, 22138, 22139, 22144, 22165, 22178, 22181, 22182, 23189, 23202, 23208, 185808, 185817, 185823, 186370, 189793, 189869, 191078, 193275, 214520, 214756, 214889, 214960, 217178, 217231, 217348, 217359, 217459, 217632, 217679, 220098, 220101, 220104, 227072, 229656, 235745, 235836, 236163, 236655, 236789, 239711, 240131, 243309, 248631, ]

//Return target index or -1
function binarySearch(array, target) {
	let left = 0;
	let right = array.length - 1;

	while (left <= right) {
		const mid = Math.floor((left + right) / 2);

		if (array[mid] === target) {
			return mid;
		} else if (array[mid] < target) {
			left = mid + 1;
		} else {
			right = mid - 1;
		}
	}
	return -1;
}


pinMatchesFightEvent = (event, fight) => {
	//Remember to set Pin Type: Filter

	//Only show AOE abilities:
	return (binarySearch(areaIDs, event.ability.id) >= 0);

	//Only show Non-AOE abilities:
	//return (binarySearch(areaIDs, event.ability.id) < 0);
}

initializePinForFight = (fight) => {
}
